page.title: 11Shops around Hill of Beath
page.content: In Hill of Beath there are very few shops.In the Main Street there is one general grocers which also sells newspapers and is run by Pakistanis. This shop also acts as a postoffice .In the housing scheme there are another two general grocers.In the part of Cowdenbeath which was in our block there were two more post offices, one chipshop,one hairdressers ,two general grocers ,one Coop,two pubs and a social club.There are no clothing shops, banks, shoe shops , cafes or furniture shops.For these we would have to travel to Cowdenbeath or Dunfermline.A mobile fish shop comes every week from the fishing village of Pittenween.Other travelling shops include a mobile video shop, a butcher's van, a grocery van and a travelling chip shop.
